mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ICLOUD_APPLICATIONAGENCY ( ID, USER_ID, NAME, AGENCY_TYPE, AGENCY_LEVEL, AGENCY_AREA, QUALITY_IMAGE_SHARE_URL, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, DELETED, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_BY, ORGANIZATION_ID, SENDED, UPDATED, APPROVAL_OPINION ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agencyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agencyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agencyArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualityImageShareUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sended,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_ICLOUD_APPLICATIONAGENCY.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE ICLOUD_APPLICATIONAGENCY
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENCY_TYPE = #{agencyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENCY_LEVEL = #{agencyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENCY_AREA = #{agencyArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUALITY_IMAGE_SHARE_URL = #{qualityImageShareUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SENDED = #{sended,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVAL_OPINION = #{approvalOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
